name: Astralcade
description:
The aliens have conquered the planets of the solar system, now it's your turn to stop them! Don't be scared by their big spaceships, or their powerful weapons: with enough practice, you can stop everyone of them!

-Astralcade is my first godot game. After some time playing with scratch, i decided to learn a serious programming language. Note that the game is not finished yet, if you find any bug please let me now-
